resources.string:
Hi, I'm Roland, the guy who develops this app.
If you find any bugs, have questions, problems or feature requests, feel free to send me an e-mail. I'm happy to help if I can.

Before you contact me though, please note that:

• I am just one person.
• I develop this app in my spare time, for free.
• I only speak English and German.
• I sometimes don't respond to e-mails quickly, so please be patient.

To continue, please type "%1$s" into the text field below and then click the checkmark button at the top.

The app could not find one of its binaries. This usually happens when the app is side-loaded or run on an unsupported device.\n\nPlease try installing the app directly from the Play Store or download an APK from
